subtitle: Thinking Allowed Conversations on the leading edge of knowledge

Hello and welcome. I'm Jeffrey Mishlove. Today, we will be exploring reprogramming

Brain and Balance Your Energy. RJ now lives

Likewise, Jeff. It's always nice to see you. I'm glad we could reconnect again.

You give, as an example, an instance in

why am I doing this? Yeah, it all came from that, oddly enough. It all came from that.
Way back when, whenever this was, it feels like

Essentially, for me to claim my life back, to

Every action, every behavior, I needed to understand

I get up, go to the bathroom. I take my notebook

I just casually catch a glimpse of my reflection

It's always all over the place. My hair was all
over the place. Now, without thinking about it,
Jeff, I just reflexively grabbed a brush and just

as to why I was even doing it. I'm brushing my

I knew I was getting somewhere. The next answer

Whoa, okay. Now, we're getting to the subconscious pattern ego of mind.
So I'm brushing my hair. Ultimately, at that

if other people find me attractive? The answer
